commands.condition: If within 7 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If no hostile figure within 7 spaces
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 5 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move within 5 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 7 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If no hostile figure within 7 spaces
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 5 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move within 5 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 2 spaces of a friendly target that is not within attack range of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Use Order ability on that friendly figure to have it move within attack range of {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move towards the nearest friendly figure.

commands.condition: If no hostile figures within 4 spaces
commands.command: {ACTION} Move towards the nearest friendly figure.

commands.condition: Reaction - If defending while adjacent to a friendly figure
commands.command: Use Cower ability if a rolled dice does not cancel anything.

commands.condition: If within 2 spaces of a friendly target that is within attack range of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Use Executive Order ability on that friendly figure to have it attack {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 2 spaces of a friendly target that is not within attack range of {ATTACK_TARGET} (adjacent for melee, 2 spaces for reach, 4 spaces for range)
commands.command: {ACTION} Use Executive Order ability on that friendly figure to have it move within attack range {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move towards the nearest friendly figure.

commands.condition: If no hostile figures within 4 spaces
commands.command: {ACTION} Move towards the nearest friendly figure.

commands.condition: Reaction - If defending while adjacent to a friendly figure
commands.command: Use Cower ability if a rolled dice does not cancel anything.

commands.condition: If within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Use Pounce ability to attack {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 6 spaces of any target
commands.command: {ACTION} Move towards most damaged target, then {ACTION} Attack that target, then move towards {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If no target within 6 spaces
commands.command: {ACTION} Move towards {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If defending
commands.command: Use Cunning ability

commands.condition: If within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Use Pounce ability to attack {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 6 spaces of any target
commands.command: {ACTION} Move towards most damaged target, then {ACTION} Attack that target, then move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If no target within 6 spaces
commands.command: {ACTION} Move towards {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If defending
commands.command: Use Cunning ability

commands.condition: If within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 5 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If no hostile figures within 5 spaces
commands.command: {ACTION} Move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - At the end of the round, if adjacent to a Rebel figure with 2 or less Health left, and not adjacent to any friendly figures
commands.command: Use Self-Destruct ability.

commands.condition: If within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 6 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If no hostile figures within 5 spaces
commands.command: {ACTION} Move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If an attack die is rolled that has no effect (no damage, no surge can be used to any effect)
commands.command: Use Targeting Computer to reroll the die.

commands.condition: Reaction - At the end of the round, if adjacent to a Rebel figure with 2 or less Health left, and not adjacent to any friendly figures
commands.command: Use Self-Destruct ability.

commands.condition: If within 2 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move adjacent to a friendly non-Guardian figure.

commands.condition: If within 6 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 2 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move adjacent to a friendly non-Guardian figure.

commands.condition: If no hostile figures within 6 spaces
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to a friendly non-Guardian figure.

commands.condition: Reaction - While adjacent to a friendly non-Guardian figure that is defending
commands.command: Use Sentinel ability.

commands.condition: Reaction - While adjacent to a friendly non-Guardian figure that is defeated
commands.command: Use Vengeance ability.

commands.condition: If within 2 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move adjacent to a friendly non-Guardian figure.

commands.condition: If within 6 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 2 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move adjacent to a friendly non-Guardian figure.

commands.condition: If no hostile figures within 6 spaces
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to a friendly non-Guardian figure.

commands.condition: Reaction - While adjacent to a friendly non-Guardian figure that is defending
commands.command: Use Sentinel ability.

commands.condition: Reaction - While adjacent to a friendly non-Guardian figure that is defeated
commands.command: Use Vengeance ability and move towards {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 6 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If no hostile figures within 6 spaces
commands.command: {ACTION} Move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If adjacent to another friendly Trooper while attacking
commands.command: If accuracy check is successful, use Squad Training ability to reroll a {SURGE}.

commands.condition: If within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 6 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If no hostile figures within 6 spaces
commands.command: {ACTION} Move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If adjacent to another friendly Trooper while attacking
commands.command: If accuracy check is successful, use Squad Training ability to reroll a {SURGE}.

commands.condition: Reaction - When defeated
commands.command: Use Last Stand ability on the closest figure in this figure's group.

commands.condition: If within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 7 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 3 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If no target within 7 spaces
commands.command: {ACTION} Move towards {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If attacking a target within 3 spaces
commands.command: Use Relentless ability

commands.condition: Reaction - If attacking an adjacent target
commands.command: Use Scattergun ability ability

commands.condition: If within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 7 spaces of any target
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 3 spaces of the most damaged target, then {ACTION} Attack that target, then move towards {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If no target within 7 spaces
commands.command: {ACTION} Move towards {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If attacking a target within 3 spaces
commands.command: Use Relentless ability

commands.condition: Reaction - If attacking an adjacent target
commands.command: Use ACP Scattergun ability ability
